definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc

sentences.english: Any plant of the genus hoya having fleshy leaves and usually nectariferous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 球兰属的任一种植物，肉质叶，花朵通常分泌蜜汁。

sentences.english: On summer evenings the flowers gave forth an almost intoxicating scent.
sentences.chinese: 夏夜，花朵发出几乎醉人的芳香。

sentences.english: Flowers in the spring sunshine are much more beautiful than ever.
sentences.chinese: 春日照耀下的花朵分外的妖娆。

sentences.english: the blossom covered the chestnut trees like great wax candles.
sentences.chinese: 满被花朵的栗子树像是巨大的蜡烛。

sentences.english: The adult likes to lay eggs in the exocuticle of the receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 成虫喜产卵于巳开放之花朵的花托外表皮内。

sentences.english: Tell the boy not to swish the flower heads off with his stick.
sentences.chinese: 告诉那小男孩别用棍子把花朵抽下来。

sentences.english: The flower mantids from Africa look like flowers .
sentences.chinese: 非洲的花螳螂就像花朵一样。

sentences.english: We were amazed. We had never seen flowers in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我们惊诧不已，从未见过能傲雪绽放的花朵。

sentences.english: But Darlene Love sang lead vocals with the Blossoms singing background.
sentences.chinese: 但达林爱唱唱歌的花朵背景主唱。

sentences.english: The bee sucks honey out of the bitterest flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂是从最苦的花朵中吸取花蜜。

sentences.english: Seed your tears deep in your heart it will grow up to valorous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 把眼泪种在心里，会开出勇敢的花朵。

sentences.english: The jasmine’s lisping of love to the sun is her flowers.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉呢喃着用花朵来表达对太阳的爱恋。

sentences.english: The boy bowled over the fence and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩撞倒了栅栏和花朵。

sentences.english: The flowers and hanging baskets were breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 花朵和吊篮生机勃勃的长着。

sentences.english: Old daddy is a beak in praenomen high school, educating the motherland's blossom.
sentences.chinese: 爸是一名中学教师，培养着祖国的花朵。

sentences.english: In ancient times, all things upon Earth smelled sweet like flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在远古时代，地球上的万物都闻起来就象花朵一样。

definition: style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
